subject.geographic: Constance St. between Phillip and First, Fourth District, New Orleans, La
Constance St. between Phillip and First, Fourth District, New Orleans, La

mods.abstract: $25 REWARD--RANAWAY ON THE 2d day inst., the negro girl JANE, a griffe, about 23 years old, 5 feet 2 or 3 inches high ; has a slight cast in one eye-- noticeable when spoken to suddenly ; cup marks on the back of the neck ; walks with a quick short step ; pleasant manner when speaking. Had on a light gingham dress and linen sun bonnet. I will pay the above for her delivery at the Fourth District Station House. WM. CUNNINGHAM, Constance street between Philip and First, Fourth District. jy16 6t*
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent. ([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
